title: Meet Our Expert Team
description: Our diverse team of professionals brings together decades of experience in both commerce and technology, united by a shared vision of excellence and innovation.

members.name: Sanjay Kumar
members.bio: Visionary leader with 15+ years in business development and technology innovation. Passionate about bridging traditional commerce with modern solutions.

members.name: Priya Sharma
members.bio: Technology expert with expertise in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and digital transformation. Leads our IT services division.

members.name: Rajesh Patel
members.bio: Supply chain and trading specialist with extensive experience in product sourcing, quality assurance, and international trade.

members.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
members.bio: Research and development leader focused on emerging technologies and their practical applications in business solutions.

members.name: Amit Kumar
members.bio: Customer success expert dedicated to building lasting relationships and ensuring client satisfaction across all our services.

members.name: Lisa Chen
members.bio: Digital marketing strategist with expertise in brand building, digital campaigns, and market expansion across multiple industries.
